meanings.definition: A period of one thousand years.
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization lasted for many millennia.
meanings.sent2: The historians studied the events that occurred over several millennia.
meanings.sent3: It took millennia for the tree to grow tall enough to touch the sky.
meanings.sent4: The ruins of the castle stood as a testament to the millennia that had passed.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time becomes vast and incomprehensible when thinking in terms of millennia.

meanings.sent1: The artifacts from different millennia were displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The library contained books from various millennia.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeeper sold rare coins from different millennia.
meanings.sent4: The paintings depicted scenes from past millennia in vivid detail.
meanings.sent5: The collection of ancient artifacts spanned across many millennia.
